ProjectTitle: Unravelling the poverty risk of children with a disability: an empirical inquiry into the role of measurement, mechanisms and policies
InitialFeedbackHistory: 30/06/2022 [REDACTED] good and detailed DMP. Please note that BOX uses US based cloud storage, since you work with very sensitive data this is not be best storage solution and the PRET team may not approve its use. [REDACTED] you are looking for cloud storage KU [REDACTED] onedrive with multi-factor authentication is already more secure but even better to use cloud storage for non-sensitive data only and use the KU [REDACTED] servers (I or J) drive for sensitive personal data. [REDACTED] a look at the storage guide (https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en) or contact your local IT team for more information. [REDACTED] sharing you can use KU [REDACTED] RDR, if you can't fully anonymize your data you can also restrict access to the files www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr.
label: good with suggestions
